privacy_policy.policy_text:
All staff, faculty, and students are required to fill out this COVID-19 self-report form if they:

Have had exposure to a COVID-19 confirmed case
Are or have experienced COVID-19-like symptoms
Have received a positive COVID-19 test result
This form will help us meet insurance and other safety requirements. This private information will only be used only during the COVID-19 pandemic to ensure:

You are covered as employees working off-site per supervisor approval, since we are not requiring signed Flex Workplace Agreements and
We are appropriately tracking staff, faculty and students affected by the COVID-19 pandemic, managing our work environment and pushing information out to you as needed
Thank you so much for your cooperation.
